title: 5.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a Certificate of Appreciation for Eric who topped the Math Wizard Competition held in school, using the Certifi cate template. (Note : The orientation of the certifi cate should be Landscape.). A sample is given here

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
